textBox.richText: In response to a few issues, we have released the 1.4.1 update to seSales. This update addresses the following issues: • Gift Card Report Corrected Corrected an error with the gift card report that was causing non-expiring gift cards to now show up. • Tax Report Corrected an error with the tax storage that was causing the tax report to be inaccurate. • Drawer Calculations Corrected error in drawer summary calculations where cash back to customer was not being included. • Activity Report Added Cost by Category to the report. • Monthly Activity Report Corrected issue with report date display. This update is free for all registered users of seSales. MSZ
